subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, has relied on J. R. Smith more than Mike D’Antoni did, but Smith’s emotions can get the best of him and affect his play.
snippet: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, has relied on J. R. Smith more than Mike D’Antoni did, but Smith’s emotions can get the best of him and affect his play.
